title: Calculate American Opportunity Tax Credit
description: Parents of a college student want to claim the American Opportunity Tax Credit for tuition expenses.

tasks.description: Gather Form 1098-T from the educational institution and the family's income information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary documents and data.

tasks.description: Verify that the student and the expenses meet all eligibility requirements for the AOTC.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the student is an eligible student at an eligible institution.

tasks.description: Calculate the maximum allowable credit using Form 8863.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the credit amount, including any refundable portion.
